titleStmt.title: The doctrine of the Masse booke, co[n]cerning the making of holye water, salt, breade, candels, ashes, fyre, insence, pascal, pascal la[m]be, egges, and herbes, the marying rynge, the pilgrimes wallet, staffe, & crosse, truly translated into Englyshe. Anno. Domi. M.D.LIIII. the xx. of May..

The doctrine of the Masse booke, co[n]cerning the making of holye water, salt, breade, candels, ashes, fyre, insence, pascal, pascal la[m]be, egges, and herbes, the marying rynge, the pilgrimes wallet, staffe, & crosse, truly translated into Englyshe. Anno. Domi. M.D.LIIII. the xx. of May..
titleStmt.author: Dorcastor, Nicholas.

notesStmt.note: Actual place of publication and printer's name suggested by STC.
Formerly also STC 7059, as found on 218:5.
Imperfect: copy at reel 2146:3 lacking last leaf.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library (reel 218:5) and British Library (reel 2146:3).
